Reviews.Title: “DONT GET SUCKED INTO THE TIME SHARE”
Reviews.Author: David C
Reviews.Content: I have been to Summer bay resort a couple of times as I do have a time share. The are is extreamly close to Disney's Animal Kingdom with the resort property touching Disneys. The ammenties are fabulous. But do not get sucked into the time share it is not worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Good place”
Reviews.Author: TREEWACKER
Reviews.Content: We stayed at SUMMERBAY for 3 nights Feb 10 - 12 it is a very nice place , very clean,quite full kitchen,would stay here again but would never do the timeshare speall again !! If you need to use the computor in the lobby they charge you 20 cents per minute what a rip off Beds are comfy pools are nice 1

Reviews.Title: “STAYED AT SUMMER BAY RESORT”
Reviews.Author: frugel-traveler
Reviews.Content: Booked a 3 week stay at the resort through RCI last June. After reading some poor reviews, became appprehesive, as we have previously stayed at the Hilton Vacation Club, and we're sure anything would be a let down. Upon our arrival, which was early, we were treated like valued guests and within an hour, our villa was ready. Everything was perfect, the location across from the pool, the cleanliness, amentities, etc. We were so pleased with everything, we made reservations for next Summer. The activities for kids was great, our daughter loved the magic show and crafts which were at no cost. Any maintanence problems were dealt with promptly and was even giving a jump start when the battery in our rental car died (I left the lights on). Everyone at this resort is great with the exception of the sales staff. We got talked into the 60 minute presentation to keep from being bothered every day during our vacation. Big mistake. Four hours later, after 3 very rude sales people, we were let go. There is so much to do at the resort, we only went to the atttraction twice during our 3 week stay (Busch Gardens and Dinosaur World).

Reviews.Title: “Nothing is really what it seems!”
Reviews.Author: EllaRuby08
Reviews.Content: Timeshare, that word itself will cause a reaction. 90 minutes becomes 4 hrs of interrogation, "obviously, you are going to go on a 10 day vacation every year". No does not mean no, it just leads to another 'incredible' offer. Even though they'll spend 45 min on the previous 'incredible' offer. Higher interest rates than the worse credit card, they are 100% ready to throw anyone the anchor that will send them into massive financial problems.

Reviews.Title: “Disney Vacation get away at Summerbay, great vacation stay.”
Reviews.Author: txagg33
Reviews.Content: My whole family took a 7 day vacation to Disney and stayed at the Summerbay Resort this year. There was a total of 6 adults and 4 kids (all girls) ranging from ages 3 to 10. This resort is very accommodating to kids of all ages, and has many activities including a water park, minature golf, and an activity center in the main office. We stayed in building 406 on the 3rd floor, which was not an issue due to the building elevator access. We stayed in a very spacious 4 bedroom suite which included 2 master bedrooms with King sized beds, jacuzzi baths tubs & walkin showers. The other 2 rooms were equipped with 2 full size beds and a guest bathroom which were very spacious as well. We enjoyed a large living area with 52" LG HDTV and DVD player, as well as 2 fully equipped kitchens. The rooms were very clean when we arrived as we were very impressed with the accommodations. The resort is within a 10 minute drive from all the Disney parks which made travel to & from during the day very convenient. There are many other convenient amenities located very close to this resort. There is a Wal-Mart and Target located within 4 miles for your general shopping needs. Overall I would highly recommend a stay at the Summer Bay Resort and I will be returning for my next Disney vacation stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fansatstic place!”
Reviews.Author: misspriss033
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this resort with my daughter, son-in-law and 4 grandchildren for a week, and it was the best holiday we had ever had, and we vacation together every winter. The staff went above and beyond to make our stay very pleasurable!! The only downside was the boat rental shop, the hours posted were not to be relied upon, it seems to be 'hit and miss'.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: cekala
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 2BD condo with 2 little children. Check In: We got there a little early and had no problems getting our room they even moved us closer to the kiddy waterslides. We had Zero hastle from the ladies giving the sales pitch. They just asked us if we were interested, told us the times and handed us a brochure. Room: Awesome, clean and pretty big. It had balcony that overlooked a pond with ducks that the kids loved. All of the towels were formed to make hearts or swans, very nice touch. The "florida house" as the kids called it came with a little goody bag that included dishwashing and laundry detergent. A TV in each of the rooms, and the bathroom in the master suite was large, to include the jaccuzzi. Amenities: The Kids LOVED the water slides. Dad liked having a bar at the main pool. Golf course is nice and pretty cheap. We never made it to the beach or looked into renting the paddle boats and jet ski's. Location: 15 min from the Disney locations, with a Walmart in walking distance. Price: We booked through the AFVC so it was only 350.00 for the week, can't beat that price. DOWNSIDE: The only negative comment me and my wife could come up with was that the WIFI was expensive. We are looking forward to visiting her again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Summer Bay Resort”
Reviews.Author: Mehry
Reviews.Content: It was awesome. Perfect place for the family vacation. It was nice and clean and most of all good quality of service.

Reviews.Title: “We were expected the worst, but it was super!”
Reviews.Author: ttsmoir
Reviews.Content: We had booked a week here back in October and a few nights before we were due to arrive (dec 13), my husband looked it up on tripadvisor and we were so surprised to read so many bad reviews!! Therefore, we were both really nervous about our arrival! But the place is nice! Its not the newest of resorts, but we got a rate of $299 for the week for a 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit with a full kitchen...they were so accomodating that once i saw the room they had for us, i wanted a unit that was closer to the kids pool, they switched us right away with no issues. It was clean....it had leather couches and chairs! It was close enough to town and Disney but far enough to feel away from it all....it was awesome and i am glad those reviews didn't scare us away, because we had a wonderful week. The only main downfall that we experiences was we had to pay either $9.95 a day for in room wi-fi, or $39.95 for the week, which is the one we opted for--it turned out to be the weakest connection and kept kicking us off....but that was the only downfall.

Reviews.Title: “90 minute presentation? I think not!!!”
Reviews.Author: kremmer
Reviews.Content: I was foolish enough to sign up for 7 days of accomadation at Summer Bay Resorts. I would have been better off just renting a motel/hotel room. The accomadations were anything but superior and there was extra "resort fees" of about $94.00 which we hadn't counted on. Two of the presentations lasted well over 4 hours each. Don't get sucked in like we did!!

Reviews.Title: “Summer Bay Resort”
Reviews.Author: DaveElmsdale
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 3 bedroom with 10 people. It was a 2 bedroom with 2 baths and a kitchen and 1 bedroom with a bath and kitchen with a common hall ajoining at the entry. The property was kept clean and the rooms were very clean and comfortable. It is a good time to buy a timeshare if you looking at doing so at this time.

HotelInfo.Name: Summer Bay by EVRentals
HotelInfo.Address: 17805 US Highway 192 No. 1, Kissimmee, FL 34714
